author: mrdylanroberts
name: DebugLogs
description: A comprehensive cog for retrieving, filtering, and managing Red-DiscordBot logs. Allows moderators and administrators to easily access full logs, recent logs, cog-specific logs, error logs, and more through Discord commands. Supports sending log files directly to Discord channels with various filtering options.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg: Thanks for installing DebugLogs! Use `[p]help debuglogs` to see all available commands. Make sure the bot has proper file system access to read log files.
